import { SpaceVertical } from '@looker/components'
import { Editor, excludedProps } from '@looker/storybook'
import { ArgsTable, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import storyVerticalBasic from '!!raw-loader!./VerticalBasic'
import storyVerticalGap from '!!raw-loader!./VerticalGap'
import storyVerticalProperties from '!!raw-loader!./VerticalProperties'
import storyVerticalReverse from '!!raw-loader!./VerticalReverse'
import storyVerticalStretch from '!!raw-loader!./VerticalStretch'

<Meta component={SpaceVertical} title="Docs/SpaceVertical" />

# SpaceVertical

`SpaceVertical` is designed to put space between its children. `SpaceVertical` operates on the vertical axis.

<Editor code={storyVerticalBasic} />

## Space & SpaceVertical Support spacing properties

1. Margin (`m`, `mx`, `ml`, etc...)
2. Padding (`p`, `px`, `pl`, etc...)

# Alignment

`SpaceVertical` supports `align` which defaults to `stretch`.

<Editor code={storyVerticalProperties} />

# Gap

Specify the width of the gap between items:

<Editor code={storyVerticalGap} />

## Reverse

Reverse the order of the items in the space.

<Editor code={storyVerticalReverse} />

## Stretch

<Editor code={storyVerticalStretch} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={SpaceVertical} exclude={excludedProps} />
